Item.Data: <Package> <Operation action_id = "Add" target_id = "roles_mapping_policy" use_bearer_certificate = "true"> <Data> <![CDATA[ <Rule RuleId="roles_mapping_policy_rule1" Effect="Permit"> <Target> <Subjects> <Subject> <SubjectMatch MatchId="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:string-equal"> <AttributeValue DataType="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"> COMCOM </AttributeValue> <ResourceAttributeDesignator AttributeId="trusted_subject" DataType="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </SubjectMatch> <SubjectMatch MatchId="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:string-equal"> <AttributeValue DataType="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"> trustedadmin </AttributeValue> <ResourceAttributeDesignator AttributeId="urn:nokia:names:s60:corporate:1.0:subject:role_id" DataType="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </SubjectMatch> </Subject> </Subjects> </Target> </Rule> </Data> ]]> </Operation> </Package>
